scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn rollup -c && yarn esCheck
scripts.extract-snippets: rm -rf codeSnippets/ && yarn docs --json codeSnippets/docs.json && node scripts/extractCodeSnippets.js
scripts.test-snippets: yarn link @cognite/sdk && yarn extract-snippets && yarn tsc -p codeSnippets/tsconfig.json && rm -rf codeSnippets/
